channel.title: Real Sam I Am
channel.description: Recent content on Real Sam I Am

item.title: Data Science
item.description: Data Science is my passion! I am currently pursuing a Masters of Data Science from UBC.

item.title: Outdoors
item.description: I have a passion for the outdoors. Here are a few of the highlights:

item.title: About Me
item.description: Sam is based out of Vancouver, BC. He is passionate about data science and the outdoors.

item.title: The Complete Data Science Setup (macOS)
item.description: One of the funnest (and most frustrating) parts of data science is the vast array of tools available to us.

item.title: Is UFC Judging Fair?
item.description: When a UFC match ends with a knock-out or submission there is never any doubt who the better fighter was.

item.title: How to Open GitHub.com Repo from the Command Line
item.description: During my Masters of Data Science I was often working on many GitHub repos at the same time.

item.title: How to Open Jupyter Notebooks with a Double Click (Mac OS)
item.description: Background Jupyter Notebooks are an awesome tool. The standard way to open a Jupyter Notebook is from the command line.

item.title: How to Deploy a Containerized Python Dash App to Heroku
item.description: I love using Plotly to build interactive visualizations. The syntax is very similar across R and Python, and plots looks great.

item.title: Cycle Touring the BC Coast
item.description: With a few spare days between finishing work and starting a masters program at UBC I was keen to experience some adventure before going back to school.

item.title: The Best Great Lake Surfing Videos
item.description: Here are a handful of videos that inspired me to get out there, buy a surfboard and surf the Great Lakes.

item.title: Cycling Portugal
item.description: While studying abroad in Istanbul I took my semester break to travel to Portugal and cycle from Lisbon to Faro.

item.title: Cycling from Kingston to Toronto
item.description: After 4 years of school at Queen’s University I was at last done.

item.title: Running Across PEI
item.description: The summer of 2013 I and my friends Cory Babiak, Taylor Jenkins, and Jose Pauig ran across PEI.

item.title: Cycling Across Canada
item.description: During my first year of university my friend Cory and I began to plan a cycling trip across Canada.
